about_the_game:
Lonesome Village - Official Guide is 218 pages fully explained document with all the information to complete the main story of Lonesome Village and get the 100% out of it.

Are you struggling to continue the adventure?
Are you stuck inside the tower with a puzzle?
Are you still missing a selfie?
Are you still missing a treasure?

We are here to help you!

This official guide created by ourselves has detailed information and images to help you solve all puzzles and discover all secrets of Lonesome Village.

Instructions


The Official Guide will be placed in the same folder as the game.

You will be able to access the folder by pressing RightClick on the game icon on Steam -> Properties-> Local Files -> Browse

It should be a .PDF File named "LV_Game_Guide.pdf"
